author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Changed all CreateEntry to CreateRawPtrWriteEntry as a way to review the new ROOT class.

THIS IS NOT INTENDED TO BE MERGED. The class in question is in the ROOT::Experimental namespace. This PR is meant to help the ROOT team see the impact if their proposed interface.
#### PR validation:

RNTuple related tests pass.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1458
title: [DRAFT] Try RRawPtrWriteEntry interface
